name: Ghosts of Pilots Present
description:
"Ghosts of Pilots Present" is a game made for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT game jam. 

You control a ship flying through the Warp, shooting down enemy ships. But the Warp has a nasty tendency - every once in a while a malevolent ghost ship appears and imitates your previous movements! 

Try to survive as long as you can as the dangers of the Warp mount. Good luck, Pilot!
